scripts.test:production:us: npx cross-env LOCALE=US npx playwright test tests --project=production
scripts.test:production:de: npx cross-env LOCALE=DE npx playwright test tests --project=production
scripts.test:production:uk: npx cross-env LOCALE=UK npx playwright test tests --project=production
scripts.test:e2e:ci: npx cross-env ENV=ci LOCALE=US USE_STAGING=true CI=1 playwright test --project=ci --shard=$CI_NODE_INDEX/$CI_NODE_TOTAL
scripts.test:e2e:dev: npx cross-env ENV=dev LOCALE=US USE_STAGING=true playwright test --project=dev
scripts.test:e2e:smoke: npx cross-env USE_STAGING=false LOCALE=US playwright test --grep @smoke --project=production
